Detailed Description

cvmx_npei_window_ctl

NPEI_WINDOW_CTL = NPEI's Window Control

The name of this register is misleading. The timeout value is used for BAR0 access from PCIE0 and PCIE1. Any access to the regigisters on the RML will timeout as 0xFFFF clock cycle. At time of timeout the next RML access will start, and interrupt will be set, and in the case of reads no data will be returned.

The value of this register should be set to a minimum of 0x200000 to ensure that a timeout to an RML register occurs on the RML 0xFFFF timer before the timeout for a BAR0 access from the PCIE#.
